Method Detail

getScreenDevice

public static GraphicsDevice getScreenDevice(int screenNr)
Finds a graphics device with a certain number. If that device doesn't exist the graphics device belonging to the first screen in the system will be returned.

Parameters:
screenNr - The number of the screen
Returns:
The graphics device

devices

public static GraphicsDevice[] devices()
Returns all screen devices in the system

isGL

public static boolean isGL(PApplet dad)
Checks whether an applet inherits from PGraphicsOpenGL

Parameters:
dad - The applet
Returns:
true, or false.
